_header: Saint Alban the holy man was here of England
Subjects: Alban, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Alban in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Albon þe holi mon was her of engelondeImartred he was uor
                    godes loue þoru our lordes sonde…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝerne seynt albon & ihesu crist wel
                    uasteþat we mote to þe Ioie come þat euer schal
                    laste

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint albon þe holy man I bore was in ingelondeI martrid he
                    was for cristus loue wit chame & wit chonde…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we to Ihesu crist & to seint albon
                    fasteþat we moot to þe ioye come þat euer chal I
                    laste
